title: What Happens When You Cross the United States Border Illegally?
subtitle: A viral Facebook post comparing U.S. immigration policy to that of North Korea and Afghanistan gets most of the facts wrong.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Undocumented immigrants in the United States receive a job, a driver's license, food stamps, health care, housing, education, a "tax-free business for seven years," and "child benefits."
